title: Free premium cable TV, Large one bedroom apartments, Close to UNLV
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Easy freeway access', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', '-Close to UNLV', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Full kitchen in apartment', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
